TestingXperts (Tx) proudly stands as a global leader in Digital Assurance and Quality Engineering, firmly positioned among the five largest providers worldwide. With headquarters strategically located in Pennsylvania, USA, and London, UK, we maintain a dynamic network of offices and delivery centers across the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, the Netherlands, South Africa, UAE, India, and Singapore.

At TestingXperts, our expertise shines through a comprehensive spectrum of Digital Assurance and Quality Engineering services that encompass QA/Test Advisory, as well as Functional and Non-Functional testing. These services are impeccably tailored to meet the demands of Next Gen technologies. Our specialization extends seamlessly to Automation, Digital, DevOps, Agile, Web, Mobility, AI/ML, RPA, Blockchain, IOT, and Big Data, reflecting our commitment to a holistic range of capabilities.

Pioneering the realm of Continuous Testing, TestingXperts proudly showcases a trailblazing team of modern testers. These experts are wholeheartedly dedicated to test automation, CI/CD implementation, and the innovative shift left methodologies. Amidst our exceptional Quality Engineering services, we’ve also carved out a dedicated domain for Digital Engineering Services, wherein we propel Digital Transformation, Cloud, AI, RPA, and Software Engineering to unprecedented heights.

By harnessing our in-house solutions, a globally distributed talent pool of skilled professionals, a specialized approach, and an efficiently streamlined global delivery model, TestingXperts paves the way for transformative journeys. These journeys empower our clients to elevate their Quality Engineering and Digital Engineering initiatives, ultimately catalyzing a paradigm shift in Customer Experience (CX) and making tangible contributions to the top and bottom lines of global industry leaders.

Our collaborative partnerships extend from pioneering start-ups to well-established enterprises spanning diverse sectors worldwide. This collective endeavor ensures the seamless delivery of systems that are unequivocally ‘ready for business.’

Underlining our commitment to excellence, TestingXperts proudly holds the Great Place to Work-Certified™ distinction, while also maintaining ISO 9001:2015 & ISO 27001:2013 certifications.

Noteworthy recognitions from industry analysts further validate our prowess:
  • We are featured in the 2023 Gartner® Market Guide for Application Testing Services as one of the Pure-Play Testing Services Providers.
  • Our achievement of the ‘Leader’ position in NelsonHall’s 2023 NEAT Chart stands as a testament to our expertise.
  • Inclusion in EVEREST group’s PEAK metrics and ISG One cements our industry relevance.

Our laurels extend to prestigious awards we’ve earned:
  • Winner of The North American Software Testing Awards 2022.
  • Winner of The European Software Testing Awards 2022.
  • Winner of the DevOps Industry Awards 2022.
  • Winner of the GSA UK Professional Awards 2022.
  • Highly commended company for ‘Best DevOps Automation Project’ at the DevOps Industry Awards 2022
As TestingXperts, we stride forward with unwavering commitment, industry distinction, and a global impact that transforms businesses and elevates technological excellence.
